name: Emosim (used to be a lot of things )
name_original: Emosim (used to be a lot of things )
description:
Emosim ( used to be a lot of things )

is an interactive thriller , shortly been made in 3 days for quarantine jam.

It's about a father, Henry, searching for a way to help her daughter be cured , but he has to use Emosim for that . . .
